column4: anyone know with xinerma between a VGI and a HDMI/DVI output, what the right line is for MonitorLayout in xorg.conf?
I've never been able to get a VGA and an HDMI to work together.. I've always had to put an adapter on the HDMI to VGA..and use 2 VGA's. (although you SHOULD be able to get it working I would hope!)
the hdmi is then using a dvi adapter. does that help?
I've never used a video card with an HDMI output.. so I honestly have no clue. :(
